DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare VIGADEXA ( moxifloxacin 0.5 % /dexamethasone phosphate 0.075 % ) ophthalmic gel VIGADEXA ( moxifloxacin 0.5 % /dexamethasone phosphate 0.1 % ) ophthalmic solution prevention postoperative inflammation infection .
DOC.brief_title: VIGADEXA Gel Compared VIGADEXA Solution Following Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old . Diagnosis cataract intention undergo routine , uncomplicated cataract surgery . Able understand sign inform consent form . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Glaucoma ocular hypertension . Use topical systemic nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) within 14 day prior surgery plan use study . Lowdose acetylsalicylic acid ( 100 mg/day ) allow . Use antibacterial , antiviral , antifungal agent ocular medication within 30 day prior enrollment study study , specify protocol . Secondary implantation replacement intraocular lens ( IOL ) study eye . Planned use contact lenses study eye study period . Cataract surgery contralateral eye within 30 day prior Screening Visit , plan 3 week cataract surgery study eye . History clinically significant trauma study eye within past 12 month . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
